Coaching Contracts- Long term research
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher Advance 2 Archive (GameBoy Advance): Miscellaneous Q&A (Post New Questions Here): Coaching Contracts- Long term research
By GoldenBoy on Sunday, February 9, 2003 - 09:21 am:

Something I have been working on and would like to have a hand for verification.

There have been varying reports on how long Coaches stay. If some people could simply mark down the hire date when they get a coach (your own or Agima) and mark the date when the retire, then post the results I'd appreciate it.

As I said this is long term, the coach I marked has just renewed for the 10th time, Nice thing is its a project you can contribute to in the normal course of ranching.

PLEASE Do not post what you think you remember about when you hired a coach! I prefer solid dates and speculation posts for this will be deleted.

By Kurasu Soratobu on Sunday, February 16, 2003 - 03:24 pm:

Arthur (the super Durahan coach)
Hired: February 1, 12
Retired: March 1, 38

By Kurasu Soratobu on Monday, February 17, 2003 - 11:33 am:

Morgan (the super Pixie coach)
Hired: May 1, 14
Retired: May 1, 40

By Kurasu Soratobu on Thursday, February 20, 2003 - 12:35 pm:

Aegis (the super Monol coach)
Hired: July 1, 40
Retired: July 1, 66

Looks like for the super coaches, at least, 26 years is the common number.

By GoldenBoy on Thursday, February 20, 2003 - 03:25 pm:

I meant to post, my Golem left today after 26 years also.

I wager a weaker coach will last less time. I think we've found the top of the range though. Good work!
